problem_type: Student drags fraction labels to tick positions beyond 1 on a 0-2 number line
workspace_description: Number line from 0 to 2, pre-partitioned into thirds with tick marks at 0, 1/3, 2/3, 1, 4/3, 5/3, 2. Labels pre-placed for 0 through 1. Drag palette contains only 4/3.
action_description: Label tick marks by dragging fraction labels to them
